Class AddressBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • AddressBook

  • public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class containing all data required to represent an address book.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EntryList entries
      The entries contained in this address book.
      private FieldList fields
      The fields implemented by this address book.
      private java.lang.String filename
      Filename of the address book.

    • Field Detail

      • filename

        private java.lang.String filename
        Filename of the address book.

        Should be empty string if address book is newly created and not yet associated with any particular file.

      • fields

        private FieldList fields
        The fields implemented by this address book.

      • entries

        private EntryList entries
        The entries contained in this address book.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddressBook

        public AddressBook()
        Populates fields with set of default fields.

        Must include all columns from customer-supplied format, but may have different names and be in different order:

        • First name
        • Last name
        • Address line 1
        • Address line 2
        • City
        • State
        • Zip code

      • AddressBook

        public AddressBook(java.lang.String file)
        Load address book from the specified file.

        If first line matches customer-supplied format, load using default column names and order (above) otherwise assume .pond format and load field names and order from file.

        If using customer-supplied format with default colums, can probably hard-code corespondance when constructing FieldList/Entry.

        Parameters:
        file - The filename to open

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldList

        public FieldList getFieldList()
        Gets list of fields in address book.
        Returns:
        Reference to fields

      • getEntryList

        public EntryList getEntryList()
        Gets list of entries in address book.
        Returns:
        Reference to entries

      • hasDefaultLocation

        public boolean hasDefaultLocation()
        Checks whether a default save location exists.
        Returns:
        filename != ""

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves address book to default last saved or opened location using .pond format.

        Use fields to maintain same order as displayed in the UI.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves address book to specified file in .pond format and updates filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - Location of file to save to

      • export

        public void export(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves address book to specified file in customer-supplied format.
        Parameters:
        filename - Location of file to save to
